reviewText: Good, but the ending should have been better, especially after investing time into it.
Absolutely one of the best films I've seen in a long time!
Awesome movie. I love Stephen Rea. His act looks so genuine.

It was a surprise to see the famous actors in their younger adult life.  You will recognize a few of them as the story progresses.  The actors are true to form and the plot is intriguing.  Brendon Gleeson is a younger happier good villain and I my opinion has the best performance you will not be is appointed with this film.
Good Movie. Irish Actor Stephen Rea ( the Crying Game) stars in this Inter-continental Prison Break Saga. I may be a bit bias. I love the star's acting and I love IRISH ACCENTS
